home.faq1A: Yes, custom alterations are available. Price varies by complexity. Contact us for details.
home.faq2Q: Can I choose a different color?
home.faq2A: Absolutely! We offer color customization on all our designs. Send us your preferred shade and we'll make it happen.
home.faq3A: Every dress is made completely according to your exact body measurements. We'll guide you through the measurement process.
home.faq4A: Production varies by dress complexity, typically 2–4 weeks. Rush orders available upon request.
home.faq5A: We offer worldwide shipping. Standard delivery takes 2–5 business days after production. Free shipping on orders over €150.
home.faq6A: We require a 50% deposit to begin production. The remaining balance is due before shipping.
home.faq7A: Due to the custom nature of our gowns, we offer exchanges and alterations rather than returns. We work with you until it's perfect.
home.faq8A: Yes! Book a private appointment in our Prishtina showroom for a one-on-one styling session.
